mapper.select: select b.id,title,create_date createDate,username,nickname FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where u.id = b.user_id and b.state_id = 1 order by create_date desc
select id,title FROM `dts_blog` order by create_date
select b.id,title,create_date createDate,username,nickname FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where u.id = b.user_id and b.id = #{id}

select b.id,title,create_date createDate,username,nickname FROM `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where u.id = b.user_id and b.state_id = 1 and b.title LIKE concat("%"#{title},"%") order by create_date desc
select b.id,b.title,b.create_date createDate,b.text,u.username,nickname from `dts_blog` b,`uts_author` u where b.user_id = u.id and b.id = #{id}
select *, create_date createDate from `dts_blog` b, `uts_author` u where b.user_id = u.id and username = #{username} order by b.create_date desc

select b.id,b.title,b.create_date createDate,u.username from `dts_like_data` l ,`uts_author` u,`dts_blog` b where u.id = l.user_id and b.id = l.blog_id and u.username = #{username} order by l.create_date desc
